name: WelderHelper
description: Maximize your Welder scores and get out of jams!  Get the most out of your saved gold tiles or find a word that will clear a locked tile.  Search for a pattern of letters, words that contain specific letters, words within a word or dictionary lookup.  Customized for the Welder game using only words of 4 to 8 characters and excluding proper nouns.  No ads or in app purchases.
